DOC.brief_title: A Study BMS-863233 Patients With Advanced and/or Metastatic Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Phase 1 Subjects advance and/or metastatic solid tumor either refractory relapsed standard therapy , standard therapy exist . ECOG performance status ≤ 2 Accessible treatment , PK sample collection require study followup Total Bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x ULN ALT , AST ≤ 2.5 x ULN Women pregnant breastfeeding Subjects know suspected brain metastasis , primary brain tumor , brain site disease Exposure investigational agent within 4 week study drug administration Subjects history gastrointestinal disease
